Attacks.Name: Quick Attack
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, this character may make a free Move action.

Attacks.Name: Hyper Fang
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Bleed special condition.

Attacks.Name: Focus Energy
Attacks.Effect: Until the end of this character's next activation, it may reroll one attack die per attack.

Superpowers.Name: Run Away
Superpowers.Effect: This character may reroll all defense dice when targeted by an attack from a character that is within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Guts
Superpowers.Effect: If this character has a special condition, it adds 1 die to its attack rolls.

Attacks.Name: Tail Whip
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, the target character's defense is reduced by 1 for its next defense roll.

Superpowers.Name: Run Away
Superpowers.Effect: This character may reroll all defense dice when targeted by an attack from a character that is within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Raticate character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
